title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is reportedly considering meeting South Korean Prime Minister Lee Nak-yon… IF Lee visits Japan for Emperor Naruhito's enthronement ceremony.According to Japanese media outlet NHK on Wednesday,… Abe expects to have a short meeting with the South Korean prime minister if Lee attends the ceremony on October 22nd.Watchers say a meeting between Abe and Lee could potentially help soothe bilateral ties that have worsened in recent months due to their trade dispute.Abe plans to meet with around 50 of the 2-hundred key figures from around the world who are attending the ceremony.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
